name: Taylor Jeffreys
text: Wonderful experience. They worked with me to help me get where I needed for payments and were very knowledgeable. Mario helped me and he was just so helpful. Will definitely be going back to him in the future. Plus Terrell helped me understand everything about the Mazda service side of things. Just wonderful people doing wonderful things. Very satisfied!

resp.text: Hi Taylor, we are happy to hear that you got exactly what you wanted out of your car-buying experience with us at Julio Jones Mazda. We wish you safe travels and look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: PF PS
text: Felecia was amazing! Her customer service skills are immaculate & made me feel very comfortable w/ Mazda taking care of my car needs. The car service was done within the specified time frame & I have zero complaints!

resp.text: Thanks for sharing your thoughts about your visit with Julio Jones Mazda. We are happy to hear that the team delivered such an excellent experience, we hope to see you again soon!

name: Doreen Richardson
text:
Professional top notch service.Been a customer over 20 years (Quality Mazda until present) I'm a owner of a 2003 Mazda6, whenever my vehicle needs service or repair I'm in constant contact from the best service Advisor Felicia Laister.Felicia will call with
updates and detailed estimates before any
repairs are done.also Amy in parts are great and very knowledgeable.also I had the pleasure of using your shuttle service..the young man was so polite and engaging.
Overall experience was great.Great customer
Service..great Service Department Team.
Thank you!

resp.text: Hi Doreen, thank you so much for the compliments! We're thrilled the staff and service have been nothing short of perfect. We hope to see you again soon, take care!

name: Joey Colvin
text: Great customer service. Will was honest and straight forward.  Very detail oriented and thorough with researching service records and getting to answers for questions. They also wash your care for you with each service appointment.

resp.text: Hi Joey, thank you so much for the compliments! We're thrilled the staff and service have been nothing short of perfect. We hope to see you again soon, take care!

name: Frances G Rushton
text: Desmond Windham greeted us with a smile and great attitude. Desmond was very thorough in answering our many questions and was very easy to work with. We will recommend Desmond to our friends.He has become a very good friend to us.

resp.text: Frances, on behalf of all of us at Julio Jones Mazda, I would like to thank you for sharing this great review about our dealership! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your experience with Desmond and we hope to see you again soon, take care!

name: Donald Elswick
text: Great car buying experience.  Salesperson (Desmond) focuses on delighting the customer.

resp.text: Hi Donald, we are happy to hear that you got exactly what you wanted out of your car-buying experience with us at Julio Jones Mazda. We wish you safe travels and look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Nicole Lovejoy
text: Desmond was awesome and help me get the best deal!! Go see him if you need a new car

resp.text: Hi Nicole, we are happy to hear that you got exactly what you wanted out of your car-buying experience with us at Julio Jones Mazda. We wish you safe travels and look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Pamela Davis
text: Everything was handled quickly and efficiently which I  appreciated because I'm an out of town customer. Felicia was polite, professional and kept me apprised of progress. Waiting area was clean. Overall an uneventful pleasant experience.

resp.text: Each and every day we strive to be excellent - reviews like yours are always the goal. Thank you for taking time out of your busy day to recognize us.

name: chris skoglund
text: Really had a bad experience with these guys. For Julio to have such a great name in our area to have bad management working for him really took me by surprise. Had a deal on a car we agree on the price told the manager that we would be there first thing in the morning to pick the car up. Even offered to pay for it over the phone. Got a text at 9 pm that they had sold it for more money without even giving me a option to match the price. Just really bad customer service and won’t recommend dealing with them.

resp.text: Hi Chris, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We are disappointed to learn of your experience and want to apologize for our lack in communication about the vehicle that you were interested in. Customer satisfaction is very important to us and we will be sure to take this opportunity to improve. We hope you have a great day, take care.

name: Amy Phifer
text: We purchased a Mazda CX-5 from Julio Jones Mazda  today. My salesman Chivas Meadows was one of the best I’ve worked with in terms of honesty, professionalism and kindness. I would definitely buy another car from him and would send my friends to purchase from him also. Thank you Chivas!!!

resp.text: Hi Amy, Thank you for sharing your 5-star review with us! We are happy to hear that Chivas was so helpful and informative, and helped you pick out your perfect car! We appreciate your business and hope to work with you again.

name: Flatcreek Farms
text: Desmond did the best job hands down on buying my new truck he was the best anyone looking for a car or truck come to him he is awesome

resp.text: We are happy to hear that you got exactly what you wanted out of your car-buying experience with us at Julio Jones Mazda. Thank you for your feedback and we wish you safe travels and look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Angela Chelette
text:
Julio Jones Mazda kept impressing me each time I had contact with an employee. Felicia in Service was so professional and patient taking time to answer my questions and explain
what was being done or what findings were made about my car. She arranged a loaner car that was totally unexpected and highly appreciated as I was essentially stranded in town. I apologize that I do not recall the gentleman in Sales who I spoke to briefly, very sympathetic to my situation; to the Service manager Matt, who advised he would allow my vehicle to remain on lot until picked up; to John who shuttled me to a car rental to leave town. Everyone, at every encounter, went above and beyond to make my experience as pleasant as possible; they were honest, upfront and exhibited complete trustworthiness, which was very refreshing to experience. Thank you all and keep up the great customer care! It really makes all the difference.

resp.text: Angela, on behalf of all of us at Julio Jones Kia, I would like to thank you for sharing this great review about our dealership! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your experience with us and we hope to see you again soon, take care!

name: Reginia Callaway
text: Come see Desmond at Mazda great salesman and can get the job done excellent people skills and all

resp.text: Hi Reginia, we are happy to hear that you got exactly what you wanted out of your car-buying experience with us at Julio Jones Kia. We wish you safe travels and look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Edward Phillips
text: Everyone in the service department is so nice and make you feel really comfortable.

resp.text: Hi Edward, thank you so much for the compliments! We're thrilled the staff and service have been nothing short of perfect. We hope to see you again soon, take care!

name: Lazonta Boykin
text: I came to Julio Jones Mazda without a doubt trying to purchase a car didn’t know if it was possible but Desmond made my experience great on getting me in a brand new cx5 if anybody looking for a car come to Julio Jones Mazda and ask for Desmond he was awesome

resp.text: Lazonta, thank you for such a thoughtful review! We are thrilled to hear about your great sales experience with Desmond! We appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you again! Have a wonderful day!

name: Ronald Kemper
text: I just bought a car from Julio Jones in Tuscaloosa Alabama.Desmond was a very good salesman he worked with me all week to get me approved. He was very patient with my situation.

resp.text: Hi Ronald, we are happy to hear that you got exactly what you wanted out of your car-buying experience with us at Julio Jones Mazda. We wish you safe travels and look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: julian george
text: Come see Desmond at Julio Jones he was awesome In getting me great deal with my car

resp.text: Hi Julian, we are happy to hear that you got exactly what you wanted out of your car-buying experience with us at Julio Jones Mazda. We wish you safe travels and look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Jonathan Ford
text: I had a unique situation where my local Mazda had no 2020 units of the CX5 Signature in stock. So I searched and found one 2.5 hours away at Julio Mazda.  I worked with Melissa and Matthew to get my SUV.  Melissa was excellent in her communications with me back and forth.  Matthew was the salesman that helped me once I arrived with the paperwork.  He made sure the vehicle was cleaned and full of fuel before I left.  Met with Mike the GM and even spoke with him on the phone prior to arriving to be sure the numbers worked were to my liking.

resp.text: Each and every day we strive to be excellent - reviews like yours are always the goal. Thank you for taking time out of your busy day to recognize us.

name: sharon Skoglund
text: Horrible to have someone making an 8 hour trip to buy a car from you CASH only to get a text at 930 the night before telling you they got more money out of someone else so they sold it to them. That's a horrible way to do business!! Manager Chris should have not even allowed that to happen!

resp.text: Hi Sharon, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We are disappointed to learn of your experience and want to apologize for our lack in communication about the vehicle that you were interested in. Customer satisfaction is very important to us and we will be sure to take this opportunity to improve. We hope you have a great day, take care.

name: Ted Mcmullen
text: Thanks Julio Jones Mazda for helping me achieve a dream of mines in buying an new car! You guys are amazing thanks.

resp.text: Hi Ted, we are happy to hear that you got exactly what you wanted out of your car-buying experience with us at Julio Jones Mazda. We wish you safe travels and look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Leslie Richardson
text: These guys work HARD to get you the car specific to your needs! I walked in with a 2018 Camaro & was blessed with a 2021 CX-5 walking out. See Mario Garner for all of your automotive needs. He will take care of you!

resp.text: Hi Leslie, congratulations on you new 2021 CX-5! Delivering a memorable and enjoyable experience is exactly what we strive to be known for. Thanks so much for choosing us and we appreciate you taking a moment to let us know how everything went, take care!

name: Lisa Dorr
text: Desmond was fantastic. Knowledgeable and friendly

resp.text: Lisa, on behalf of all of us at Julio Jones Mazda, I would like to thank you for sharing this great review about our dealership! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your experience with Desmond and we hope to see you again soon, take care!

name: April Dansby
text: Desmond Windham is the best Thanks for a job well done please go see him he's the man

resp.text: Each and every day we strive to be excellent - reviews like yours are always the goal. Thank you for taking time out of your busy day to recognize us.

name: Kenya Beard
text: I always have a wonderful experience with both the service department and sales team at Julio Jones Mazda. Fast and friendly service! Awesome job!!

resp.text: Kenya, on behalf of all of us at Julio Jones Mazda, I would like to thank you for sharing this great review about our dealership! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your experience with us and we hope to see you again soon, take care!

name: Sayona Brown
text: They were very professional and helpful. They went above and beyond to offer great customer service. They explained every issue that i had with my car. I will definitely be taking my Mazda to them from now on.

resp.text: Sayona, on behalf of all of us at Julio Jones Kia, I would like to thank you for sharing this great review about our dealership! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your experience with us and we hope to see you again soon, take care!

name: Anthony Williams
text: Very good experience. Desmond did a very good job at helping me find a new car

resp.text: Hello Anthony, We are happy to hear about your awesome car-buying experience with us. Thank you for the great feedback on our staff and leaving us a five-star review. We look forward to seeing you again in the future.

name: Lauren Robertson
text: Bought my second car from Mazda! Had the best experience and it’s all thanks to my new forever car salesman, Matthew!

resp.text: Hi Lauren, our team at Julio Jones Mazda appreciates your 5-star rating and wonderful review! We are grateful for your business and loyalty. Congratulations on your 2nd car with us, and we look forward to working with you for many years to come!

name: Sonja Manthey
text: Had a great experience buying our first Mazda with Desmond.

resp.text: Hi Sonja, we are happy to hear that you got exactly what you wanted out of your car-buying experience with us at Julio Jones Mazda. We wish you safe travels and look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Alan Manning
text: I absolutely love the service I received! Truly great, and very friendly staff. They do a wonderful job taking care of you and making sure all of your needs are met while you wait on your car to be serviced.

resp.text: Alan, on behalf of all of us at Julio Jones Mazda, I would like to thank you for sharing this great review about our dealership! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your experience with us and we hope to see you again soon, take care!

name: Tabitha Payne
text:
I met Matthew Moss while looking at the Mazda 6’s. He introduced himself and asked some questions about my needs in a car. He pointed out the safety features, the roominess of the car, the amazing gas mileage and other features found in the Mazda 6.
Matthew introduced me to Rick Cantrell. They were both extremely knowledgeable and in no way were “pushy” or made me feel the importance of buying a car that day. I felt a sense of trust in talking with both of them.
I went home did my research and emailed Rick to send me a final cost breakdown. I was extremely happy with it and told him that I’d be there after work to pick it up.
When I arrived, it had been cleaned and the gas tank was full! I drove off in the first new car that I’d purchased in over 20 years. I absolutely love my new car and would recommend Matthew and Rick to anyone who asks me about my car.

name: JauWana Dansby
text: Thanks for your help and hardwork. Desmond Windham... I will be tell more people about you guys.

resp.text: Our reputation is one of our top priorities. Your positive review is what we are always striving for!

name: Christopher (Chris) Gill
text:
If I had just dealt with the service department it would be a five star rating. The young lady that helped me with my service was friendly, professional, and was on top of the process the whole way!

They lose a star because the parts department left a lot to be desired. It was next to impossible to get them on the phone and after a while the system sends you to a voicemail that no one apparently ever checks. I left 8 or 9 messages and never got a call back. My part had been there for three days before I found out from someone in service (when I called) that it had arrived. They either need more people in parts to handle the load or better training.

resp.text: Hi Christopher, thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We are happy that you enjoyed your experience with us - but do want to apologize for the negative experience you had with our Parts department. This is not acceptable and it will be looked into and addressed immediately. We appreciate your business and hope to work with you again soon. Take care.

name: James Lee
text: I was given caring professional service.

name: James Weiley
text: Everyone there is so sweet.they make sure that you are taking care of.and if you sit and wait.they make sure that you are comfortable.thank y’all for being so nice and sweet.

resp.text: James, on behalf of all of us at Julio Jones Mazda, I would like to thank you for sharing this great review about our dealership! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your experience with us and we hope to see you again soon, take care!

name: Iyana Strother
text: Felicia in sales is very sweet and patient. Great service.

resp.text: Iyana, on behalf of all of us at Julio Jones Mazda, I would like to thank you for sharing this great review about our dealership! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your experience with Felicia and we hope to see you again soon, take care!

name: tj 7847
text: The sales associate Chevy was a great help and got me into a vehicle quickly and easy. Would recommend anyone to do business with them.

resp.text: Hi TJ, we are happy to hear that you got exactly what you wanted out of your car-buying experience with us at Julio Jones Kia with Chevy. We wish you safe travels and look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Arnold Takundwa
text: The service department was excellent! My service advisor, Felicia Laister, was knowledgeable, professional, and kind. She made sure that my experience was a great one. I've had bad experiences with other area Mazda dealerships in the past. Thankfully, that wasn't the case here. Many thanks!

resp.text: Hi Arnold, thank you so much for the compliments! We're thrilled the staff and service have been nothing short of perfect. We hope to see you again soon, take care!

name: Calvin Dennis
text: The only thing they did that sticks out that was different than normal was the fact they did all they could to help me out and agree to reasonable prices . Friendly staff , very relatable . Recommend this dealership to anyone looking for a great car !

resp.text: Hi Calvin, thank you for sharing your feedback! At Julio Jones Mazda, our team strives to offer exceptional customer service and we are thrilled to hear that we hit the mark. We hope to see you again soon, take care!

name: Smita S
text: I was driving through Tuscaloosa on the way home, and the knocking sound in my car was driving me crazy. I’d just gotten my car looked at in my hometown and told nothing was wrong, but that just didn’t seem right. I called to make an appointment at Julio’s. They saw me immediately, found the problem within minutes (loose lug nuts), explained what must have happened, where it was, and fixed it + washed my car as part of their complimentary services. Lol got a tour of the place while I was waiting, too. Never been treated that nicely at a Mazda dealership in the 5 years I’ve been going to them in three different states.

resp.text: Hi Smita, thank you so much for your awesome review. We want nothing but the best for our customers, and we're so happy you had such a great experience with us! We will continue to bring you quality service and help you out with all your car needs. Take care!

name: Julia Prince
text: Chevy was very professional helpful Love that guy goes beyond the call of duty

resp.text: Julia, on behalf of all of us at Julio Jones Mazda, I would like to thank you for sharing this great review about our dealership! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your experience with Chevy and we hope to see you again soon, take care!

name: debbie crocker
text: They were the best! Matthew Moss and Jordan Sizemore we’re so helpful! They helped me whole way through the deal with all my questions and my grandkids! I would recommend them to everyone!

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with Julio Jones Mazda, Debbie. Our goal is 100% customer satisfaction and it sounds like we achieved that goal with you. We appreciate your business and we hope to see you again soon. Take care!

name: maggie lloyd
text: Friendly people great prices, good services

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a wonderful rating and review for our team! We'll be sure to pass your kind words along. We look forward to working with you again!

name: Carlton Posey
text: I just want to congratulate MAZDA for being #1 in "Consumer Reports."  NOTE:  the beaten include BMW, MERCEDES, TOYOTA, HONDA, & 27 other car manufacturers!!!!!!!!

resp.text: Hi Carlton, thank you for leaving us such a great review! The team here at Julio Jones Mazda is thrilled to know we exceeded your expectations and it's wonderful to hear that your most recent visit with us is deserving of your 5-stars. We look forward to working with you again soon, take care!

name: Aaron Cano
text: I always receive the best service from Julio Jones Kia Mazda!! Their staff is so personable and helpful. Special thanks to Mr.Rivera and Felicia! I can always trust them to go above and beyond expectations.

name: Jill Felts
text: The staff at Julio Jones Mazda are very friendly! Felicia Laister, the service advisor is always so helpful with answering any questions I have about my SUV I purchased there last year. She is very professional and pleasant! Keep up the great work!

name: Cathey Kidd
text:
The people there were very welcoming and friendly. Everyone that crossed my path greeted me with a smile and a hello, even the employee that came through the door that was just passing through while I was watching TV.

The receptionist has extremely helpful, very sweet lady. She kept me updated even though I don't think I was there 45 minutes. She made sure I knew where the necessities were, she even gave me the remote LOL.

The service were GREAT & FAST. I was told it may take an hour but like I said before, I don't think I was there 45 minutes. I even receive a complimentary car wash.

Thank you Julio Jones Mazda. I don't know when, but I will definitely be back.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your great review, Cathey! We're glad that our entire team provided you with such a positive experience. If you ever need anything in the future, please don't hesitate to let us know. Take care!

name: Jazlyn Gaines
text: Very nice and efficient! :) Thank y’all for the help!

resp.text: Each and every day we strive to be excellent - reviews like yours are always the goal. Thank you for taking time out of your busy day to recognize us.

name: Caitlin Burton
text: Wonderful service and staff! The team provided accommodations to my needs as I waited! Also, they sent text updates regarding my appointment and called when they were finished with my vehicle. Will be coming back, thank you!!

resp.text: Hi Caitlin, thank you so much for the compliments! We're thrilled the staff and service have been nothing short of perfect. We hope to see you again soon, take care!

name: Jerry Carter
text: Great Service,  courteous staff.  I bought a 2015 CX5 there and I really enjoy the car. Also, I was having trouble with a 2002 VW Passat.  They asked me to bring it in and the certified technician fixed it.  Great place to do business!

name: Demetrius Peoples
text: My Sales Consultant was Todd Herbert. Todd provided a very welcoming experience at Julio Jones Mazda. Todd was honest, transparent, and has extensive valuable knowledge of the automotive industry. Todd was very instrumental in providing me with a great deal. I would recommend Todd Herbert as a Sales Consultant to my friends and family. I would also recommend Julio Jones Mazda for anyone looking for a quality vehicle at an excellent deal.

resp.text: Hi Demetrius, thank you for taking the time to leave us this feedback. We truly appreciate that you chose Julio Jones Mazda and are happy to hear about your positive experience with us. If you need anything else, please let us know!

name: Jacqueline Hood
text:
Julio Jones Mazda is the place to get ur vehicle’s.  The staff is very friendly and nice. This is my second vehicle I purchase frm them.
Thank you’ll.

name: Shelita Crowell
text: Quick and Easy Process! Car Doctor made us feel welcome and got us the car we wanted. We will definitely be telling others to go to Julio Jones Kia!

resp.text: Hi Shelita, we are happy to hear that you got exactly what you wanted out of your car-buying experience with us at Julio Jonrd Mazda. We wish you safe travels and look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Leigh Persky
text: My son is a student at UA and had a flat.  Usually no big deal except the key for his locking lugs snapped in two.   I called the service center at 2 and they said bring it on over and they would get it taken care of.  He had to have his car so he.could get to all of his Million Dollar Band practices which started the day after.   When I explained that they were more than willing to help.  Got it done with no problems.  Great crew and service writer.  If you need help you should visit Julio Jones Mazda.

resp.text: Hi Leigh, thanks for leaving us a review! We appreciate the opportunity to earn your business and are honored you trust your vehicle needs with us. Please do not hesitate to reach out if we can be of any further assistance until then take care!

name: Callie Rhodes Outlaw
text: I bought a vehicle here in May and had a great experience. Everyone was so friendly.

resp.text: Hi Callie, we are happy to hear that you got exactly what you wanted out of your car-buying experience with us at Julio Jones Mazda. We wish you safe travels and look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Suzanne Henson
text: Prior to Friday, July 3, I would have given a 5 star rating to this dealership. However, on July 3, I found myself on the side of Hwy 82 for 3 hours with the oil light on, despite having the vehicle in for the 8,000 mile servicing the day prior. I was told Monday, July 6 the vehicle was 1 quart low on oil and the technician had been fired. The previous Friday I was told the technician had a long history of no problems. While the dealership manager listened and offered a complimentary service, I doubt anything I was told. I will be attempting to trade the vehicle soon.

name: Grace Schepis
text: Outstanding, fast service! Thank you.

resp.text: Hi Grace, thank you so much for the compliments! We're thrilled the staff and service have been nothing short of perfect. We hope to see you again soon, take care!

name: rushing concrete
text: Desmond was a great salesman!!

resp.text: Each and every day we strive to be excellent - reviews like yours are always the goal. Thank you for taking time out of your busy day to recognize us.

name: Jill Lancaster
text: Very good costumers service.

resp.text: Thank you for your 5-star rating, Jill. We truly appreciate you choosing Julio Jones Mazda for your automotive needs. We hope to see you again soon, take care!

name: Preston O'Neal
text: Great service and great people! Would highly recommend this place to anybody! Got in and out in a hurry.

name: Trina Busby
text: I had been looking at Lexus and BMW for my new car purchase when I saw the new Mazda commercial and decided to check them out.  I was amazed that the number of amenities combined with the price blew the other brands away, and I left in a new CX-5!  My salesman Todd Hebert was so knowledgeable and enthusiastic that it made my car-buying experience easy!  The quality and affordability of the Mazda makes me recommend it to anyone looking for a new car!  From my salesman Todd to the sales manager Larry Taylor to the finance person James Otieno, the service at Julio Jones Mazda is amazing.  If you’re looking for a new car, I highly recommend Todd Hebert and the whole Mazda team.

resp.text: Hi Trina, thank you for choosing Julio Jones Mazda and for this feedback. We work hard to deliver great care to all our customers and we're happy to see that was reflected in your visit. Thanks again for your business and we hope to be here for you for miles to come!

name: Samantha Ray
text: I guess they are too busy to sell a car. I called early one day and never got a call back. Called again the next day and they were rude but took my number again. Still never heard back from them. It's probably best, I found the exact same vehicle with less miles for way less money in Birmingham.

resp.text: Hi Samantha, thank you for bringing this to our attention. Our goal is for everyone to only have positive experiences with us and so we apologize that you had a negative experience. We tried to see if we had any records of you in our system and we could not find you with your name, if there is anything more that we can do to address your concerns please send me an email to wecare@buyfromjulio.com. Thank you, take care!

name: Robert Jones
text:
I could not have asked for more courteous or prompt attention. These are professionals.
An engine alert light appeared while we were on the interstate in route. We phoned ahead to Julio Jones and described our problem. They were waiting for us when we arrived, immediately attended to our problem, and  had us on our way in 30-40 minutes.

resp.text: Hi Robert, we couldn't be more grateful that you took the time to write this review about your last visit with us! Customer satisfaction is always our top priority, and it pleases us to hear of your experience! We look forward to working with you again down the road, take care!

name: Lisa Nix
text: Thanks Belinda for making our first visit to Julio Jones Mazda in Tuscaloosa amazing!!  I highly recommend this dealership!  Very professional and fun to work with!

resp.text: Hi Lisa, thank you so much for sharing your experience with us. Our goal is always 100% customer satisfaction and it sound like we achieved that goal with you. We appreciate your business and we look forward to working with you again next time!

name: Steve Nix
text: Dealing with Belinda at Julio Jones Mazda was pleasurable experience to say the least. Great staff throughout the entire dealership. Thanks for my new Mazda.

resp.text: Hi Steve, thank you for taking the time to leave us your feedback. We strive to ensure every customers experience is exception, and we are happy to hear that we delivered that for you. We hope to work with you again soon, take care!

name: Beth Thomas
text: Nice people but they don't stand behind the tires they sell. They charge for balance and rotation every time you go in. First place I have ever been that did that. In the past, balancing was always free when you bought the tires at other businesses.

resp.text: Hi Beth, we appreciate your feedback and you bringing this to our attention. Unfortunately, typically we still charge for this type of service but it is definitely something we can look into changing. We apologize for the inconvenience you experienced and if there is anything further you would like to discuss or something that we could do in order to recieve your future satisfaction please send me an email to wecare@buyfromjulio.com. Thanks, and have a great day.

name: Kristi Pierce
text: Go see my buddy Desmond if you are looking for a Mazda!!!

resp.text: Kristi, on behalf of all of us at Julio Jones Mazda, I would like to thank you for sharing this great review about our dealership! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your experience with Desmond and we hope to see you again soon, take care!

name: Austin Russell
text: Corey Woddruff was a very fair and enthusiastic salesman. I live in Birmingham and Corey delivered my car to me at the bank so I could get some paperwork finalized without driving back to Tuscaloosa. No complaints and once again Corey went above and beyond.

resp.text: Austin, thank you for sharing your experience with us! Our team works incredibly hard to exemplify the commitment to customer care and we're so thankful that your time with us was well spent. Please feel free to reach out to us with any questions or future auto needs, as we are always here to help.

name: Lisa Bryant
text: Great people great service and my car detailed! Who could ask for more!!??

resp.text: Hi Lisa, thanks for leaving us a review! We appreciate the opportunity to earn your business and are honored you trust your vehicle needs with us. Please do not hesitate to reach out if we can be of any further assistance until then take care!

name: Juliann Winfree
text: Belinda Bender was really enthusiastic and helped us into a new car! She led us through a complicated process and we ended up with a car we love. The renovations on the buildings are beautiful. Go to Julio Jones.

resp.text: Thank you for taking time out of your day to recognize us, Juliann. We apprecaite your business and are pleased you had such a fantastic experience with our team here at Julio Jones Mazda. We look forward to being here for you for miles to come, take care!

name: Lisa Song
text: Good place! Nice people!

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback with us, Lisa! We work hard to make sure our guests have an awesome experience. We will share your comments with our team and we look forward to working with you again down the road.

name: James Roper
text: I have bought my last 3 cars from julio jones mazda(streak of bad luck) but I wouldn't buy anywhere or from anyone else but julio jones mazda and the car doctor ansharn glenn. He is hands down the most effective car salesman I have ever seen. If you need a new car head on over to julio jones and see the car doctor. The service staff is amazing. Dylan at Kia and Felicia over at mazda. The entire staff goes above and beyond at every opportunity. Thanks to all of you for the help you have given me.

resp.text: Hi James, thank you so much for being a continued loyal customer of ours here at Julio Jones Mazda. We appreciate your 5-star review and look forward to being here for you for many more years. Take care!

name: Debra Gibson
text: Great service as always.

name: Cassie Smith
text: Excellent experience. Great customer service. Terrell took the time to find out what we wanted and found a vehicle to match. Pricing was fair and we got a great deal.

name: Randie Watkins
text: Our salesman was great, price was great, disappointed in the rest.

name: DjE 3000
text: Wonderfull dealership they want you to have a new car every year if possible lol!!

text: Great Service!

text: AJ was our salesman and he is great this is the person who you want to sale you a car I have nothing but praise to the entire sales force

resp.text: Thanks so much for this great feedback and your business, Tim! We were happy to help you and give you a wonderful car-buying experience. We look forward to being here for you for any future automotive needs you may have, take care!

name: Misty Weekley
text: I bought my new Mazda CX-5 Saturday from Julio Jones Mazda and I had a great experience there. They beat the price of the dealership I had been looking at in Birmingham and the staff there was great to work with. If you need a new car, go see Mark or Terry at this dealership! Terry is a great honest guy and such a nice guy to work with. You won’t be disappointed! My finance guy was great too! Explained everything thoroughly to me and answered all the questions I had. I am glad I kept my business in Tuscaloosa and used Julio Jones Mazda to buy my vehicle!

name: Jesse Norris
text: Quick for service.  Plus, they had boy scouts slot car racing in the main lobby.  Made the wait feel even shorter.

resp.text: Jesse, thanks for the 5-star review and your business! We are pleased to hear you had such a positive experience waiting for your car to be serviced, take care!

name: Drew Huang
text: No one ever answer the phone at parts department.  Call many times even left messages, no one calls me back.

resp.text: Drew, we are very sorry about this. Could you please send us your best contact info to wecare@buyfromjulio.com and someone will follow up with you right away. We have been having extensive phone issues and we appreciate your patience working through this. Thank you

name: Sandrine Hope
text: The existence was very good. They took the time to talk to us about what we wanted and about the car. Upon purchase they even made sure we knew about all the features of the car by going over each one of them.

name: Lorin Floyd
text: My mother purchased my dream car which is the Mazda CX-3 from Julio Jones Mazda in Tuscaloosa, Alabama. After she surprised me with the car, she told me that this was the easiest car buying experience that she has ever experienced. She began to tell me that their customer service was extraordinary and that she would highly recommend the dealership and using Jared Davis as the salesman. After my surprise I returned to the dealership for Jared to show me all of the car’s features. As soon I pulled up, he ran outside and was very excited to meet me. He was very nice, funny, and thoroughly went over how everything worked. He even folded all of the pages in the owner’s manual that I would need. As we were talking I found out that we are going to the same University and have the same major, and he even offered to give me advice for the school as well. With that, I would highly recommend Julio Jones Mazda and Jared Davis to any future car buyers.

name: E m Culp
text: I have been using Mazda service for years. The service department needed to keep my old car overnight, they loaned me a brand new Mazda-3, great service but it gave me the new car bug. Highly recommend

name: Julia Mccain
text: This is the place to go if you have any trouble with your vehicle. The Service Department went the extra mile to to help me!!  Five stars to the whole department!!  SUPER NICE!!

name: Robert W. Lewis
text: Wasn't expecting to buy a car but these guys and gals up here are so nice and patient, I'm very undecisive and not used to buying new cars but they made it very pleasant and Belinda at Julio Jones went above and beyond to get me in my very first new Mazda 3 Grand touring manual trans at the best price possible!!! I'll will be back again.

resp.text: Thanks for the 5-stars, Robert! We are so glad Belinda was there to ensure you had a smooth and easy car-buying experience. Please feel free to give us a call, if you have anymore questions about your car. Take care!

name: James Carr
text:
Mrs Belinda was very helpful very nice and also great service, I would recommend anyone to come to Julio Jones Mazda to see her (Mrs Belinda)
😇😇😇

resp.text: Hi James, we couldn't be more grateful that you took the time to write this review about your last visit with us! Feel free to call or stop by if there is anything else we can do for you. Take care!

name: Mike Black
text: Harold Bishop is first class service advisor.  There is another young lady who greeted me and assisted me on my initial trip and I wish I had gotten her name.  Jeff consulted with Service tech Chad Cooper and correctly diagnosed my problem. Jeff ordered part and it arrived on day promised. Chad Installed and now I have my MAZDA back ! I was in this office several times from initial consultation until final repair.  Dealt with all same people but never all same each trip. Was impressed how they all worked together and knew what was going on.  Even repaired a recall that I did not mention.  Must admit I was little hesitant to bring my car here as this is brand new MAZDA service dept and have been going to Bham to have serviced but am totally satisfied.

resp.text: Hello Mike, we are grateful to receive your amazing review and rating! Our team enjoys going above and beyond for our customers and are happy to hear our entire team was a perfect example of what we stand for at Julio Jones KIA. It brings much joy to our team knowing you had a five-star experience with us, and that you chose us for your automotive needs. Have a great day!

name: Marty Hoven
text:
I dropped by without an appointment for an oil change and had to be in and out within 2 hours. The service writer, Jamark, told me no problem. He got me right in and I was out within the hour.
Certainly, I could have gone to one of those "15 minute oil change" places, but that is all you get. Here, your service is recorded and that adds to the value of the automobile when the time comes to sell or trade.

name: lamar Williams
text: Ms Belinda & Shawn Was Very Very Helpful On Getting Me One Of My Dream Cars I Suggest You Come And Shop With Them

resp.text: Thanks so much for the 5-star review, Lamar. We are so happy we were able to put you in your dream car and look forward to helping you for miles to come! Take care!

name: Brandon Arrigo
text: Friendly and helpful staff. Service department is superb! This place beats Med Center Mazda in Pelham hands down in the service department. I highly recommend.

text: I purchased a 2018 Mazda 3 hatchback from Mr. T. Byrd at Julio Jones Mazda. Just had my cars serviced there. Mr. Bishop helped me out. I had an online coupon from the JJones Mazda website, and it was a little tricky to redeem the coupon, but we got it to work. The service was good and quick. Nice internet access and coffee while you wait. I will continue to get my Mazdas serviced there.

resp.text: Hi Gunars, we're happy to see our team provided you with the quality service you deserve when searching for your car. Welcome to the Julio Jones Mazda family and we can't wait to see you here for your next service visit!

text: Aj went above and beyond to make buying a new car fast and easy! All of the staff were very friendly and helpful. I would recommend this dealership to anyone looking to buy!

resp.text: Hi Drew, thank you so much for this 5-star review. We are so glad to read about your positive experience with us here at Julio Jones Mazda and if you need anything else, we are always here to help!

text: No complaints with the quality or price of services just how long it took to set up the appointment and get an estimate. Could be better

resp.text: Hey Ryan, we appreciate your feedback. I will send this to the correct department to address any issues you may have experienced while trying to get an appointment. Thank you!

name: ryan silas
text: Took the car there for recalls last friday. Had a tool come up missing while it was there. The manager looked into the incident and they are working to figure out what happened. They have been very helpful in resolving the matter and hopefully they can either figure out what went wrong or who took the tool. They were very prompt and professional in handling this situation and i look forward to doing business in the future. Theft makes everyone look bad no matter who did it and i hope they can find the person that did it.

resp.text: Hi Ryan, thank you for taking the time to leave us this review! We are so glad that you had such a positive experience with our team here at Julio Jones Mazda and we look forward to being here for you next time!

name: Lee Thompson
text:
I went for an oil change and a tire rotation. They were very friendly and accommodating. I was in and out in 35 minutes. We have recently moved to this area so this was a relief to find a dealership so friendly.

I purchased a vehicle April 5 and couldn't be happier. The dealership was very attentive to my needs. Phill Harman was my sales associate and I give him five stars for his attention. He was very knowledgeable and explained everything in detail. Phill made the whole process comfortable. I highly recommend this dealership if you are in search for a new vehicle.

resp.text: Thanks for the great review, Lee! We are so happy to see we were able to get you in and back on your way.

name: Chandricka Dunner
text: Jared Davis Made things flow very nicely for us.He’s hilarious as well! Wouldn’t have wanted to have any other consultant help us. Thanks Julio Jones Mazda!

name: Cheryl Buchanan
text: I arrived early for my appointment and they took my car right in. The waiting room was clean and pleasant. The service manager was helpful and attentive. He asked me what services I wanted for my car in addition to the airbag recall repair. A friendly, young salesman sat to chat with me for a few minutes as I waited. Jared asked about my Mazda and my experience with the dealership. He was genuinely interested and enthusiastic about working for Julio Jones Mazda. I learned that Tuesday’s are “Ladies Day” which meant 15% off oil changes AND free massages by a therapist from Nancy Taylor Day Spa!!! I have NEVER had such a pleasant car service experience. My car had the airbag repair, an oil change, tire rotation, 17 point inspection, and the headlight “glaucoma” polished in just over an hour. When this dealership was owned by Verta Barr, it had the reputation as the best service department in town. I think that under Julio Jones’ ownership, it will regain that reputation.

name: Larrian Tutton
text: Just got my car serviced at the all-new Julio Jones Mazda. It was quick and the service advisor Jamark was very Knowledgeable. I recommend all Mazda customers to come here for your service, and also if you are in the market for something new.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Larrian. We are so happy to see you had a great experience with us.

name: Vicki Allen
text: We are from out of town and had an emergency that only the dealership could fix. They saw us right away and did everything they could to help us. We were very grateful for their prompt attention.

name: undertaker861
text: Was there for routine service. Everything was taken care of in a timely manner. All employees that I had contact with were very nice and courteous.

text: I didn't end up getting the car but experienced nothing but exceptional service. Ronald was extremely accommodating and did everything he could to make a good deal.

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback about our team. We aim to be as helpful as possible and give everyone the best experience. We are happy to hear that in the end you got the attention you deserve while searching for a car. Take care!

name: John Perry
text: I was extremely pleased with the service given. Most willig to accomodate. I appreciated that they checked for any recalls on my vehicle. It's hard to say enough good things about my experience at Julio Jones Mazda. Thanks everyone.

name: Jerry Winegard
text: Sales was great and we will certainly buy from them again.  We really like our 2019 Kia Forte S model. Service had one little hiccup but they were quick to correct it.  Julio Jones is the place to get your new Kia.

resp.text: Thank you for the 5-star review, Jerry. We are so happy to hear that you had a wonderful and smooth experience purchasing your new vehicle with Ansharn. Providing honest and efficient customer service is always our goal. Enjoy your new ride and feel free to reach out with any questions!

name: Andrea Howell
text: This is where my daughter bough her Kia.

resp.text: Hi Andrea, we appreciate the five star review and your business! We are glad you had such a positive experience and if you need anything at all, we're here to help!

name: Dylan Davies
text:
What can I say? My husband and I went to look at the Mazda CX-5. We found one online, previously, and wanted to drive one before we drove all that way to Birmingham to see it. They made us a proposal, "If we  can cut you a deal on a new one, can we have your business?" Well, of course if the price is right then, yes. We drive a grey CX-5, everything is great, but they are calling this car "new" and it has 7500 miles on it. Well, it's never been owned they say its a "demo" car. Then my husband tells them he wants to be at $19,999 financed for this car (yes, we were putting several thousand down - we didn't expect a miracle deal). They only get it down to $20,010. Then he says, well if you throw in remote start, we will take it. They came back with each of us paying half so, we decided to buy the car.

They told us that they could get us a killer interest rate of less than one percent. When we got back to financing, it was another story entirely. We ended up wit ha 4.99 interest rate because "less than one percent is only for "new" cars" well when you were trying to negotiate this deal you said it was a new car and now that we are financing you've classified it as a "used" car.

After we left, we began driving to my dad's house which is probably 100 miles away. The check engine light came on before we got there. We had O'Reily's check the computer and they said it was low oil pressure. We called and they has us call the Mazda tow truck to come pick it up and take it to the nearest Mazda which was in Birmingham. (They told me to get a rental during this time and they would pay me back.) They called for me to come pick it up three or four days later saying it was a computer problem and it was fixed. When we got there, 4 error messages were popping up on the dash. We left the car and called the sales manager at Julio Jones Mazda who never called us back and said he never got our message.

I went in to talk to the Julio Jones Mazda sales manager about this problem on Monday. They had me sit there for a while and eventually said they spoke with the technician at the Birmingham Mazda and they said I must have taken my foot off the brake too early and it caused the car to throw up those error messages. So, they blamed me for the problem.

Later, the technician from Birmingham called us personally and said they had screwed up and not fixed it properly to begin with. So, the sales manager at Julio Jones Mazda was either misinformed or blatantly lied to make me think it was my fault.

Well, we finally got the car back and it has been running fine. No more issues. However, they still haven't paid me back for the rental and it's been almost a month. I called about this and they said they lost my receipt and asked me for the amount again. I still haven't been paid and they haven't bothered to call me back. That was a week ago.

Simultaneously, I took the car in to the Julio Jones service center to get the remote start put in on a Thursday. They told me it would take a day, maybe two, to get this done. The service center is telling me that I owe our half of the remote start that was supposed to be included in the deal. Obviously, they didn't include it in the price like they said they would. Also, they had to give me a rental car because they couldn't get the remote start to work. It's now Monday and I have no clue when I am going to get my car back. I called today and they said they still couldn't get the remote start to work.

Needless to say, I don't wish this headache on anyone and I wouldn't recommend this dealership to anyone. It has been an absolute nightmare since we signed for this vehicle.

resp.text: Hi Dylan, thank you for your feedback. We sincerely apologize for your experience, as we strive to provide all of our guests with 5 star service. We understand that our management team has worked with you on this matter and has provided you with a reimbursement check for your rental charges. If there is anything further that we may do to assist you, or if there is any further feedback that you would like to provide, please feel free to email us at WeCare@BuyFromJulio.com. Thank you

text:
WORST EXPERIENCE OF OUR LIVES!!
these 4 and 5 star reviews have to be fake or paid for. have to be!
I got a car from them a little while back , charged almost 6000$ over what the car was worth and was assuming I was getting a decent  car. NOPE!
It’s completely undriveable,I spent every penny our family had in the bank and everything I could borrow and I’m still paying payments and it’s sitting in a shop till I can pay the rest of the bill.
They knew about the problems and lied to my face !
Stay far away

resp.text: Hi Jonathan, I am sorry to hear about your experience with A&M Auto Sales. I can assure you that management has changed since then. We are very different now and strive to provide the best service possible!

name: Robert Bates
text: Stay away! They are deceptive and cheats. I bought a truck from them at an outrageous price (had no options at the time and needed a truck A.S.A.P. for business) and I have spent over $5,000 fixing it in the 6 months I've owned it. I was told by Lee and the "salesman" that the truck was $11,000, only to charge me $13,000. Of course once I realized what they did and contacted them they play dumb and it is too late. I know if I should have taken more time to review and ask questions but it was the end of the day, past business hours already and I needed to leave with the truck that day. Regardless you should never practice those business ethics in any industry. I have had to change the rotors, brakes, brake drums, brake cylinder, master cylinder, calipers and brackets, hub assembly, CV axles, steering arm, I am in the process of changing the transfer case (over $2,000 on it's own) and it still needs a steering column, gear box, front differential, driveshaft and possibly the rear differential. When it's all said and done I will have put at least 5 times the value of this truck into making it run right and paying it off. I am a self employed remodeler and I have missed countless days of work, lost countless jobs and it's gotten to the point that I am having trouble paying for my daughters daycare and buying her essentials. This whole deal has radically ruined my life. These people knew the situation I was in and absolutely took full advantage. Beware!!!

resp.text: Hi Robert, I am so sorry to hear about the terrible experience you had with A&M Auto Sales. Our management has changed since then. We now have a great team behind us to help with any issues with the vehicles for future or current customers!

name: Marvin McCoy
text: I highly recommend this place if you are looking for a car!!!! They had what I wanted, and did what was need to get me driving the same day!!! Thanks Mr. Lee and special thanks to Tommy

name: John Galliera
text: Never been.

resp.text: Hello John, thank you for the 3 star review. You can come in and visit us at 518 1st Street North, Alabaster, AL. 35007 . We are close by the Shelby Baptist Hospital, we will be happy to help you find a new vehicle.

name: Shalanda Hill
text: Me an my Husband has had no problems at all so come in an purchase u a car👌

resp.text: Thank you Mrs Hill for everything!!!

resp.text: Hello Mr. Davis, we are sorry about your experience with our vehicles. We are now under different managment and can assure that the vehicles are now thoroughly cleaned. I hope that you can give us another chance in the future!

text: Great sellers they really understood my situation and got me a great deal I recommend this business to everyone. Thanks you guys
